Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| PCDSeBT |
| PDCTBT |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "it" (it is a pronoun that refers to the subject of the sentence, but it is not a material name)
* "Se°°°Se" (this is a chemical formula, not a material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
